title: The Superior Foes of Spider-Man, Vol. 1: Getting the Band Back Together
description: It's a brand-new sleeper-hit series starring some of Spidey's deadliest baddies! Boomerang and his fellow villains prove that with terrible powers come terrible responsibilities...and Spider-Man will soon learn that with superior villains come superior problems! Out on bail and aiming to stay out of jail, Boomerang must get his cronies on target - but does Frank Castle, the one-man army known as the Punisher, have them targeted already?Collecting: The Superior Foes of Spider-Man 1-6
author: Nick Spencer
